channel.title: NBC Sports Fantasy Football News
channel.description: Latest player news and analysis for fantasy football from NBC Sports.

item.title: 49ers declared K Eddy Pineiro, LB Tatum Bethune, DE Sam Okuayinonu, RB Jordan James, WR Jordan Watkins, OL Connor Colby, and DT Kevin Givens inactive for Week 13 against the Browns.
item.description: Pineiro missed practice this week with a hamstring issue and will miss a second straight game. Matt Gay, who made both of his field goal tries and both extra point attempts in Week 12 against the Panthers, will kick for the Niners against the Browns. He’s not a great fantasy option considering the weather conditions expected in Cleveland on Sunday.

item.title: Chris Olave (back) is active for Week 13 against the Dolphins.
item.description: Olave dealt with back spasms during practice this week. He presumably felt fine after Friday’s practice, as it was reported over the weekend that he was expected to play. There is some re-injury risk with Olave, but fantasy managers can’t fade his elite target-earning potential. Inactive for the Saints are RB Alvin Kamara, DT John Ridgeway, DT Khristian Boyd, CB Rejzohn Wright, DB Ugo Amadi, TE Zaire Mitchell-Paden, and OL Barry Wesley.

item.title: Darren Waller (pec) is active for Week 13 against the Saints.
item.description: Waller was activated from injured reserve over the weekend but still drew the questionable tag, largely as a procedural matter. He will likely be on a pitch count on his first game back, keeping him in the TE2 ranks for a week despite him putting up TE1 numbers before going on IR. Inactive for the Phins are QB Quinn Ewers, CB AJ Green III, LB Andre Carter, WR Tahj Washington, and DT Matthew Butler.

item.title: Texans declared G Laken Tomlinson inactive for Houston’s Week 13 game against the Colts.
item.description: After starting seven games this year, Houston has moved away from Tomlinson in the interior line. He was active in Week 10 and Week 11, but recorded zero offensive snaps in each game. Also inactive for the Texans are LB Jamal Hill (hamstring), QB Graham Mertz (third quarterback), T Jarrett Kingston and WR Braxton Berrios.

item.title: Titans declared WR Mason Kinsey, CB Jalyn Armour-Davis, S Jerrick Reed, S Kendell Brooks, G Drew Moss, C Lloyd Cushenberry, and DT Shy Tuttle inactive for Week 13 against the Jaguars.
item.description: Cushenberry was ruled out due to a foot injury. His absence will force the Titans to reach into their offensive line depth against a solid Jaguars pass rush. Meanwhile, Mason Kinsey is made inactive with Elic Ayomanor (hamstring) officially active and Xavier Restrepo playing again this week.

item.title: Browns RB Jerome Ford (hamstring) is active for Week 13 against the 49ers.
item.description: There was some question as to whether Ford would play in Week 13 after being downgraded to a DNP on Thursday as he deals with a lingering hamstring issue. Ford being active is a slight hit to Quinshon Judkins’ fantasy prospects, though the Browns should be run heavy enough for Judkins to deliver RB2 numbers. The Browns declared G Zak Zinter, T Cornelius Lucas, WR Jamari Thrash, TE Brenden Bates, DE Alex Wright, and DT Adin Huntington inactive against the Niners.

item.title: Falcons declared WR KhaDarel Hodge, WR Drake London (knee), ILB Josh Woods (hamstring), OL Michael Jerrell, WR Casey Washington and DL Elijah Garcia inactive for Atlanta’s Week 13 game against the Jets.
item.description: Since receiving eight targets in Week 8, Hodge has one target in four games and now is a healthy scratch. London didn’t practice all week and is a question mark for Week 14. Star guard Chris Lindstrom (toe) continues to play through an injury on the questionable line.

item.title: Panthers declared CB Jaycee Horn, LB Christian Rozeboom, LB Claudin Cherelus, C Cade Mays, WR Hunter Renfrow, DT Jared Harrison-Hunte, and DT Cam Jackson inactive for Week 13 against the Rams.
item.description: Half of these players, including Horn, were ruled out on Friday due to various injuries. Renfrow is a healthy scratch, which has been the norm for the veteran receiver who hasn’t seen the field since Week 6. Despite being the home team, the Panthers enter Week 13 as massive underdogs to the 9-2 Rams.

item.title: Jaguars declared WR Dyami Brown, RB Cody Schrader, DE Travon Walker, OL Chuma Edoga, LB Yasir Abdullah, OL Patrick Mekari, TE Hunter Long, and DT Arik Armstead inactive for Week 13 against the Titans.
item.description: Armstead was a late addition to the injury report with a hand issue and is now officially inactive for Week 13. With Travon Walker (knee) also ruled out, the Jaguars’ defense line is looking sparse against the Titans. Meanwhile, Dyami Brown is a healthy scratch as Brian Thomas Jr. (ankle) makes his return.

item.title: Rams declared QB Stetson Bennett, RB Jarquez Hunter, CB Derion Kendrick, OL Beaux Limmer, and DE Desjuan Johnson inactive for Week 13 against the Rams.
item.description: The Rams enter the day with a 9-2 record and are operating at nearly full strength against the Panthers. Whether by land or by air, the Rams should have no trouble moving the ball against a Panthers defense that ranks 18th in yards allowed but will be without its top corner in Jaycee Horn.
